Title: MoBuddy
Description: MoBuddy is a sample social network application to help users to gather tourist information from their friends (e.g., Facebook friends) and share their experience after travels. It's developed in C#, Silverlight and hosted on Azure.
HomeWiki:
Project Description
MoBuddy is a sample social network application to help users to gather tourist information from their friends (e.g., Facebook friends) and share their experience after travels. It's developed in C#, Silverlight and hosted on Azure.

MoBuddy also supports users to gather landmarks such as water fountains, libraries, firehalls, etc. from the Vancouver Open Data Catalogue, or any other resources of OGDI Open Government Data Initiative.
